articles.author: Alex Kozul-Wright
articles.title: Can the EU and NATO impose tariffs on India and China, as Trump wants? - Al Jazeera
articles.description: In an effort to end Russia’s war in Ukraine, the US president proposes tariffs targeting Putin’s major trading partners.
articles.content:
US President Donald Trump has called on NATO and EU member states to hit China and India with tariffs of up to 100 percent to force Russian President Vladimir Putin to end the war in Ukraine.
Trump,… [+6861 chars]
